sentences.english: But my people have forgotten me for days without number!
sentences.chinese: 我的人民卻忘了我，時日已久長，無法計算。

sentences.english: This kind of negative thinking is why people don't stay on diets for long.
sentences.chinese: 恰是這類長極的主意，讓人們不能久長地保持節食。

sentences.english: Today's world stage, the energy is always a topic for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 當古的世界舞臺上，動力永遙非一個久長的話題。

sentences.english: Love me little, love me long。
But my people hath forgotten me days without number.
sentences.chinese: 我的人民卻忘了我，時日已久長，無法計算。

sentences.english: For they are our life and length of days.
sentences.chinese: 因它們是我們的生命，使我們日子久長。

sentences.english: Our love was meant to constitute rrncluding always will forever.
sentences.chinese: 我們的愛是命中註定的而且會一直久長上去。
